0.1.name: wordpress/distinct-preview
0.1.description:
This plugin adds a big red "preview" watermark to post previews. Never again be confused whether you're looking at a preview or a published post!

Note: This plugin may not work well if your theme involves a background image on your body.

This plugin is a component of the MIT Educational Collaboration Space project.
